keyword: how many calories in a fun size snickers
title: How Many Calories in a Fun Size Snickers?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a fun size Snickers, including full nutrition facts like carbs, sugars, protein, fat, and sodium for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Fun Size Snickers?
assumptions: Standard Fun Size Snickers bar (~17 g), milk chocolate, nougat, caramel, and peanuts; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, exact size, and storage; values based on average USDA data. Check packaging for precise info.

quick_answer.text: A fun size Snickers bar contains about 80 calories with 8.5 g sugars and 1.1 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp peanut butter on top

faqs.q: How many calories in a fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: Approximately 80 calories per fun size bar.

faqs.q: What's the sugar content in a fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: About 8.5 g of sugars per bar.

faqs.q: Does a fun size Snickers have protein?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1.1 g from peanuts and nougat.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a fun size Snickers?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 g total fat, including 1.5 g saturated.

faqs.q: Are fun size Snickers lower in sodium?
faqs.a: They contain about 45 mg sodium per bar, moderate for a treat.
